infosTrusk: Trusk is a company that does blablabla
adresseDepart: Please provide the pick-up address, ex: 25 Rue du Petit Musc
adresseArrivee: Please provide the drop-off address, ex: 74 Rue Saint-Paul
autreAdresse: If you do not find the desired address, retype one with more details
serviceClient: Please contact our customer service for more details: 01 76 34 00 78
demandeListeObjets: Enter a list of items for delivery, eg: 3 chaises, 1 table, 2 canapés
prixExact: Continue to have an exact price
numEtages: Please provide floors at departure and arrival separated by a comma, put <sidewalk> if necessary, eg: 3, sidewalk
dateLivraison: Quel jour voulez vous être livré? (JJ/MM)
livraisonAujourdhui: Would you like it to be delivered today? If not, please type another date (DD/MM)
prenom2: your first name? If not, please type it.
nom2: your last name? If not, please type it.
choixAdresseFact: Choose your billing address or type another one
commentaire: Any particular message for your transporter?
codePromo: Please provide your promotion code if you have one
pasCodePromo: I don't have a promotion code
continuer: Please click a button to continue.
entreeInconnues: unrecognized entries. Please check the format and retype, or contact our customer service 01 76 34 00 78 to report new categories.
datePassee: Please provide a date in the future.
heurePassee: Please provide a time in the future.
inactive_session: Your session has been inactive, would you like to
sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Type anything to restart
